CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 11, 1964, pg. 1 reads: "Health-O-Rama Begins - The first Health-O-Rama of the year began on April 9 and is continuing until Sunday, at the Savoy Ballroom, Centre Ave. and Dinwiddie St...The second photo shows little Justine Jones preparing for a hearing test, as her mother, Mrs. Betty Jones, and (left to right) Taylor Thompson and Albert J. Charles operate the testing instrument.  Mr. Thompson is co-chairman of the Men's Community Participation Committee, and Mr. Charles is the coordinator  of the Health-O-Rama. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Justine Jones preparing for hearing test, with Taylor Thompson, mother Betty Jones, and Albert J. Charles posed in front of hemophilia display at the Health-O-Rama, Savoy Ballroom
